name: Roboin
description:
Invasion The city was covered with thick fog. Heavy footsteps and sounds of destruction are heard. They are not aliens... Difficulty NORMAL - reduced damage multiplier but it's still difficult for a beginner. HARDCORE - damage multiplier x2 (if you love to die). Controls W A S D - MOVE SPACE - JUMP MOUSE 0 - FIRE MOUSE 1 - SCOPE E - INTERACT (to take a weapon, hands must be free) Q - DROP WEAPON  Keys A door with an inscription lock needs a key... Airdrop Flare summons an airdrop with a random weapon. Gaze must look up when the shot occurs. Boss Boss - UFO. To win you need 2 - 3 hits from the rocket launcher. The boss attack is very strong and will be displayed here Attacks can be avoided by running. Tactical recommendations Try to avoid close contact with enemies. It is better to attack when they are just approaching. Do not rush to finish the game. This dude is always a priority You can easily hide behind cars then the enemies will not see you. !The game is still in development !Bugs are not excluded

Update 0.31 - added robot animation to menu I saving main settings when exiting the game I some sounds changed.
